title: Cobb Bat Off Print - Opening Day Code
author: slantycouch

posts.post_title: Cobb Bat Off Print - Opening Day Code
posts.post_content:
Posting this here because of the T206 content. 

To celebrate Opening Day the first five folks who use code "OPENINGDAY" will get 50% off our print "The Georgia Peach". Direct link [URL="https://www.prewarprints.com/#4"]here[/URL]. 

Happy Opening Day, all!

[IMG]https://i.ibb.co/3RJb9cC/02-cobb-fb.jpg[/IMG]
Thanks for the promo code, I'm looking forward to seeing the  print in person
thanks for the code I hope you do a 1948 leaf satchel paige

[quote name="Maxjacks" post=2002076]Thanks for the promo code, I'm looking forward to seeing the  print in person[/QUOTE]

You're welcome! Looking forward to your feedback. 

[quote name="MR RAREBACK" post=2002217]thanks for the code I hope you do a 1948 leaf satchel paige[/QUOTE]

So many great, bold images in that set! 


It was also pointed out to me that yesterday was technically Opening Night, not Opening Day. Don't want to let anyone down so I added 3 more uses to the discount code, if anyone is still interested.

Chris,

I just wanted to take a moment to publicly let you know how beautiful this Cap and Buck print is. Without getting too poetic on you, this print really embodies everything i love about baseball in the 1800s-early 1900s.  

Very high quality, displays wonderfully, and the bonus Ewing card also was very cool to receive. 

Thanks again
I couldnt be any happier with the cobb print I received using the code. Fantastic quality on everything I definitely will be looking to order again.

[quote name="MailboxBaseball" post=2005544]Chris,

I just wanted to take a moment to publicly let you know how beautiful this Cap and Buck print is. Without getting too poetic on you, this print really embodies everything i love about baseball in the 1800s-early 1900s.  

Very high quality, displays wonderfully, and the bonus Ewing card also was very cool to receive. 

Thanks again[/QUOTE]

I missed this earlier! Thanks so much for the feedback, Evan. I'm so happy you like the print. 

[quote name="Maxjacks" post=2007909]I couldnt be any happier with the cobb print I received using the code. Fantastic quality on everything I definitely will be looking to order again.[/QUOTE]

Thanks, Max! Please share photos if it ever makes it up on your wall! :)
